property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. [+1]: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest." - Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My cause is simple: To stop you, at any cost, from ever seeing the inside of this keep."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Reinforce 1 - {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Kor Aeronaut enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Reinforce 2 - {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and - with a little luck - a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . ‘strange.' Regent's orders." - Ranya, skyhunter captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Flying Other white creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Stormfront Riders enters the battlefield, return two creatures you control to their owner's hand. Whenever Stormfront Riders or another creature is returned to your hand from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no ‘I' in ‘team,' but there's a ‘we' in ‘weapon.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power." - Orim, Samite inquisitor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature. When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." - Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The nim raid our homes without warning. We must defend our homes without hesitation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, I understand. Home isn't where you rest. It's what you fight for." - Elspeth Tirel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap two target creatures. • Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Reinforce X - {X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tideshaping is more than creating a few new puddles."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {W}, {T}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped. When Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Kithkin card from your hand. If you don't, Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. Reinforce 1 - {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap up to two target artifacts. −X: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. −5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The parts are as strong as the whole.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We sculpt the land into what we need - homes, armament, fortresses of war. Our strength comes not only from knowing, but from commanding the terrain." - Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact." - Sargis Haz, artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Condor enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Condor attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die." - Pontifex, elder researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clockwork Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Hydra attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, Clockwork Hydra deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Hydra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card. At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do bad things always come in threes?" - Gisulf, expedition survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Create a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying. {1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Release that which was never caged." - Spellbomb inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." - Baron Sengir

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target artifact creature. • Put a charge counter on target noncreature artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A taut slipknot trigger is the only thing standing between you and standing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
